titleStmt.title: The speech of the Lord High Steward, in Westminster Hall, at the time of his pronouncing the judgment of the House of Peers against the Lord Viscount Stafford, the seventh of December, 1680
titleStmt.author: Nottingham, Heneage Finch, Earl of, 1621-1682.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by the assigns of John Bill, Thomas Newcomb, and Henry Hills ...,

notesStmt.note: This item appears at reel 770:2 as Wing N1409, and at reel 824:37 as Wing S4864 (cancelled in Wing 2nd ed.).
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
